mapper.select: SELECT p.plugin_name as pluginName, m.`name` as libraryName, m.id as libraryId, l.trigger_type as triggerType, l.success as success, l.execute_result as executeResult, l.execute_time as executeTime, l.trigger_time as triggerTime, u.nickname AS creator FROM llm_material_plugin_definition p INNER JOIN llm_material_plugin_config c ON p.uid = c.plugin_uid INNER JOIN llm_material_library m ON c.library_uid = m.uid INNER JOIN llm_business_job b ON c.uid = b.foreign_key INNER JOIN llm_job_log l ON b.uid = l.business_job_uid LEFT JOIN system_users u ON b.creator = u.id WHERE p.deleted = FALSE AND c.deleted = FALSE AND b.deleted = FALSE and l.deleted = FALSE order by l.id desc LIMIT #{start},#{size}

SELECT count(l.uid) FROM llm_material_plugin_definition p INNER JOIN llm_material_plugin_config c ON p.uid = c.plugin_uid INNER JOIN llm_material_library m ON c.library_uid = m.uid INNER JOIN llm_business_job b ON c.uid = b.foreign_key INNER JOIN llm_job_log l ON b.uid = l.business_job_uid WHERE p.deleted = FALSE AND c.deleted = FALSE AND b.deleted = FALSE and l.deleted = FALSE

select b.library_id as libraryId, b.app_uid as bindAppUid,p.app_uid as appMarketUid,b.app_type as bindAppType, (CASE b.app_type WHEN 10 THEN a.name WHEN 20 THEN m.name when 30 THEN json_unquote(JSON_EXTRACT(p.configuration, '$.appInformation.name')) END ) as appName FROM llm_material_library_app_bind b LEFT JOIN llm_app a ON b.app_uid = a.uid and b.app_type = 10 LEFT JOIN llm_app_market m on b.app_uid = m.uid and b.app_type = 20 LEFT JOIN llm_creative_plan p on b.app_uid = p.uid collate utf8mb4_general_ci and b.app_type = 30 WHERE b.library_id in
#{libraryId}
